questions.question: What is the name of Rachmaninoff's most famous composition?
In what year did Rachmaninoff emigrate to the United States?
What is the title of Rachmaninoff's first symphony?
answers: Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini

questions.question: What is the name of the condition that Rachmaninoff was believed to have, which gave him an extraordinary reach at the piano?
What was the name of the estate where Rachmaninoff was born?

items.question: What was the name of Rachmaninoff's cousin who was also a famous composer?
What is the name of the piece that Rachmaninoff composed for his graduation from the Moscow Conservatory?
answers: Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini

items.question: Who was the conductor at the disastrous premiere of Rachmaninoff's Symphony No. 1?
What was the name of Rachmaninoff's wife?

questions.question: What was the name of the hypnotherapist who helped Rachmaninoff overcome his depression and writer's block?
What is the name of the choral symphony composed by Rachmaninoff, based on a poem by Edgar Allan Poe?
answers: The Fall of the House of Usher

questions.question: What is the name of the piece that Rachmaninoff considered his best composition?
answers: Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini

questions.question: What was the last piece of music Rachmaninoff played in public before his death?
answers: Rhapsody on a Theme of Paganini
